explains: adj. 混乱的，无秩序的；（与）……混沌（有关）的

sentences.en: The traffic in the city is chaotic in the rush hour.
sentences.cn: 在上下班高峰时间，城市的交通混乱不堪。

sentences.en: My own house feels as filthy and chaotic as a bus terminal.
sentences.cn: 我自己的房子感觉和公共汽车总站一样污浊混乱。

sentences.en: There were violent and chaotic scenes when police moved in to disperse the crowd.
sentences.cn: 警察上前驱散人群时，现场出现了暴力和混乱场面。
